item.title: Need someone
item.dc:creator: @I_Am_Olan14 I Am Olan14
item.description:
@I_Am_Olan14 wrote:

Im at my little cousin Julio’s house and their computers admin account is password protected so I can’t logon it and I can’t install JDK to compile this little program I made him.
I need someone to compile it and give me the class file.
Thank you.
Because they already have JRE somehow.

The java source code:

[code]
import java.awt.FlowLayout;
import javax.swing.;
import java.io.;
import java.awt.*;
import java.awt.event.ActionListener;
import java.awt.event.ActionEvent;

public class juliosGames extends JFrame implements ActionListener
{

public juliosGames()
{
this.setSize(300, 220);
this.setResizable(false);
this.setDefaultCloseOperation(JFrame.EXIT_ON_CLOSE);
this.setTitle(“Julio’s Games - By Oldrin”);

	JPanel myPanel = new JPanel();
	JMenuBar myBar = new JMenuBar();
	JButton noggin = new JButton("Noggin");
	JButton sponge = new JButton("Sponge Bob");
	JButton nick = new JButton("Nick Jr.");
	JButton cartoon = new JButton("Cartoon Network");
	JMenuItem exit = new JMenuItem("Exit");
	this.add(myPanel);
	this.add(myBar);
	myPanel.add(noggin);
	myPanel.add(sponge);
	myPanel.add(nick);
	myPanel.add(cartoon);
	myBar.add(exit);
	this.setVisible(true);

}

public void actionPerformed(ActionEvent evt)

{

	 String cmd = evt.getActionCommand();
if(cmd.equals("noggin")) {
Runtime.getRuntime().exec("rundll32 url.dll.FileProtocolHandler http://www.noggin.com/"); 
if(cmd.equals("sponge")) {
Runtime.getRuntime().exec("rundll32 url.dll.FileProtocolHandler http://www.nick.com/shows/spongebob_squarepants/index.jhtml");

}
if(cmd.equals(“nick”)) {
Runtime.getRuntime().exec(“rundll32 url.dll.FileProtocolHandler http://arcade.nickjr.com/nickjr/home.jsp”);
}
if(cmd.equals(“cartoon”)) {
Runtime.getRuntime().exec(“rundll32 url.dll.FileProtocolHandler http://www.cartoonnetwork.com/games/index.html”);
}
if(cmd.equals(“exit”)) {
System.exit(0);
}
}
}

public static void main(String args[]) {
new juliosGames();

}
}[/code]

Please I need this now.

Read full topic
